columns.Campus: The identifier of the campus offering the enrollment.
columns.Year: The academic year of the enrollment data.
columns.TotalEnrollment_AY: The total number of enrollments for the academic year.
columns.FTE_AY: The full-time equivalent student count for the academic year.

enrollments.table_description: The enrollments table tracks enrollment statistics for different campuses over time.

columns.Campus: The identifier of the campus employing the faculty members.
columns.Year: The academic year relevant to the faculty statistics.
columns.Faculty: The total number of faculty members at the campus.

faculty.table_description: The faculty table tracks faculty data associated with different campuses over time.

columns.Year: The academic year when degrees were conferred.
columns.Campus: The identifier of the campus awarding the degrees.
columns.Degrees: The total number of degrees awarded in the year.

degrees.table_description: The degrees table tracks the number of degrees awarded by campus each year.

columns.Campus: The identifier of the campus for the enrollment data.
columns.Discipline: The unique identifier for the academic discipline.
columns.Year: The academic year of the enrollment statistics.
columns.Undergraduate: The total number of undergraduate enrollments.
columns.Graduate: The total number of graduate enrollments.

discipline_enrollments.table_description: The discipline_enrollments table tracks enrollments by discipline and campus each year.

columns.Id: The unique identifier for each campus record.
columns.Campus: The name of the university or college campus.
columns.Location: The city where the campus is situated.
columns.County: The county in which the campus is located.
columns.Year: The year the campus was established or recognized.

Campuses.table_description: The campuses table tracks information about different university campuses.

columns.Campus: The unique identifier for each campus associated with fees.
columns.Year: The academic year corresponding to the fee amount.
columns.CampusFee: The fee amount charged by the campus for that year.

csu_fees.table_description: The csu_fees table tracks fee data associated with campuses and academic years.
